availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John C. Cable (Rockcastle County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Rockcastle County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Elias Cable and Tamsey Cable. Farmer in Rockcastle County in 1860 and 1863.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, Mt. Vernon, p. 45; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, District 6, p. 25; Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registrations, 1863-1865, Ancestry, Kentucky, Congressional District 8, Rockcastle County, Kentucky, June 1863, p. 80.
